txt.en: 'I have been resting for several days, but now I am journeying back north to Haudh Lin.'
'I am ready to get back to my shipbuilding. Being too long away causes my mind to wander.'
'The sound of the gulls fills me with unease. I find that most peculiar.'
'I must discuss the storage needs of my next ship with Breged√∫r. He is the cooper here at Celondim.'
